item.title: Название поста 2
item.text: 2 Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. item.title: Измененное название 333
item.text: 33 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Numquam illo, deleniti ipsum officia soluta nam molestias illum eligendi sed, commodi autem expedita optio quaerat veritatis sit itaque!
